name: Be Aware of the Knowers
description:
Be aware of the knowers
"Be aware of the knowers " - rereading of "MAY THAT WAR BE CURSED" of Maria Primachenko, 2022.
On the 24th of February, 2022, news about the bombing of a Ukrainian Museum by the Russian attack where a collection and many others were brought to the ground and left to the ashes... now, throuht strugles and inspiration moments, as artists, we decided to honor Mrs. Primachenko and her legacy.

"Be aware of the knowers" is a rereading of Maria Primachenko burned art entitled "MAY THAT NUCLEAR WAR BE CURSED!" from 1978 recreated in 2022.
